page.title: 03Malcolm,a Farmer's Son.
page.content: At the break of day,about 7 o'clock,I get up,have my breakfast,get my clothes on and get ready to go and help my Dad. At the farm Dad would sharpen the combs and cutters for the shearing machine.We would then get in the landrover and go up to Harecleugh to get the clipping machines.I would help to load up the landrover.When we get back we would set up the machines.Douglas would have the sheep in.Dad goes out and starts the generator.My job is to roll the fleeces and pack them in the wool bag.Sometimes I go in the wool bags and jump in the corner to pack in the wool.At the end of the day I go home covered in wool and mucky with the grease out of the fleece.
